message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $8500 is a good one, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! I'll sell the product to you for $9000. It's a great compromise, if you ask me!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8200?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget is tight, but I'm not willing to go below my minimum price of $8500. I'll try to meet you in the middle again. I'll sell the product to you for $8750. It's a fair compromise, if you ask me!
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider $8000?
